>
[Sneaky](/Feats.aspx?ID=2368) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Stealth is an important tool in your arsenal. You can move 5 feet farther when you take the [Sneak](/Actions.aspx?ID=63) action, up to your Speed.

 In addition, as long as you continue to use Sneak actions and succeed at your Stealth check, you don't become [observed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=27) if you don't have cover or greater cover and aren't [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) at the end of the Sneak action, as long as you have cover or greater cover or are concealed at the end of your turn.
